title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 25 October 2013 - XWiki
content:

02:27 <sburjan\_> is now known as <sburjan`>  
04:30 <Denis> has joined #xwiki  
05:51 <Denis> has quit  
07:58 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
08:26 <Denis> has joined #xwiki  
08:49 <sburjan> has joined #xwiki  
08:55 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
08:59 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
09:09 <mflorea> Good morning, can all of you that have issues assigned and set to 5.3M1 move them to M2? Thanks  
09:12 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
09:18 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
09:19 <mflorea> vmassol: you have 3 issue for 5.3M1 that have commits on master (besides the commits on the feature branch). Should I move them to M2?  
09:20 <mflorea> tmortagne: can you move your jira issues to M2? Thanks.  
09:20 <tmortagne> mflorea: sure  
09:21 <vmassol> mflorea: yes please  
09:22 <mflorea> vmassol: ok  
09:22 <vmassol> tmortagne: do you still have a problem with my blog on myxwiki.org?  
09:22 <vmassol> I patched it but people still have issues for my blog  
09:23 <tmortagne> vmassol: when did you patched it ?  
09:23 <vmassol> yesterday  
09:23 <tmortagne> evening ?  
09:23 <vmassol> yep 19:30 yeseterday  
09:23 <tmortagne> I received your last blog post 1h ago so looks like it's not fixed  
09:24 <vmassol> grrrr  
09:24 <tmortagne> new one  
09:24 <tmortagne> 1 min ago  
09:24 <tmortagne> but I don't seem to receive Ludovic blog anymore  
09:24 <tmortagne> only your last one  
09:25 <tmortagne> but maybe Feedly does not check blogs as often  
09:25 <tmortagne> it seems to check ours every 30 minutes  
09:25 <tmortagne> yours  
09:26 <mflorea> vmassol: [reminder] you have closed jira issues missing documentation. I'll ignore them for now :)  
09:27 <vmassol> restarting myxwiki.org  
09:29 <vmassol> hmm I think I did http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-9520 but I kept it open for a reason, maybe just doc  
09:29 <vmassol> closing for now in 5.3M1  
09:30 <mflorea> ok  
09:30 <vmassol> same for http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-9237  
09:30 <vmassol> and http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-9236  
09:31 <vmassol> I think I had left these 3 open because it was missing doc  
09:33 <vmassol> tmortagne: I've new copied the exact feed-api jar I had put on xwiki.org to myxwiki.org, please let me know if it's fixed  
09:33 <vmassol> s/new/now  
09:34 <vmassol> (this would mean I didn't fix the issue in scm)  
09:34 <tmortagne> vmassol: yep will check for new  post in feedly in 1h  
09:35 <tmortagne> did you checked that the links in the feed XML were correct ?  
09:39 <vmassol> tmortagne: I could not reproduce this  
09:39 <tmortagne> even yesterday ?  
09:39 <tmortagne> as I don't see what else could cause this behavior in feed readers  
10:10 <mflorea> vmassol: you merged feature-resource-and-wiki-modules into master right?  
10:11 <vmassol> I see a xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-wiki so yes  
10:11 <mflorea> oky  
10:11 <vmassol> xwiki-platform-resource is there too  
10:41 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki

16:10 <KermitTheFragger> has joined #xwiki  
16:16 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
16:20 <vmassol1> has joined #xwiki  
16:21 <vmassol> has quit  
16:24 <vmassol1> has quit  
16:30 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
16:37 <vmassol> has quit  
16:46 <mflorea> [all] I'm going to start the 5.3M1 release soon. Hold your commits on master!  
16:55 <cjd> hmm still didn't get that patch finished  
16:56 <tmortagne> cjd: patch about what ?  
16:58 <cjd> I was meaning to patch FS attachments as per the problem we discussed yesterday  
16:58 <tmortagne> cjd: I think mflorea took care of this  
16:58 <tmortagne> saw a commit about that  
16:58 <tmortagne> mflorea ?  
16:58 <mflorea> yes  
16:59 <cjd> thanks a million  
16:59 <mflorea> cjd https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/f6d4206c042f00cc982c0fee09ea24e2fe4ae9f9  
16:59 <cjd> I am really terrible at working on this codebase :(  
16:59 <mflorea> not the cleanest fix but I was in a hurry to release 5.3M1  
17:00 <cjd> the cleanest fix is to break the bad api which involved DB id numbers  
17:01 <cjd> anyway, thanks again and hit me up if you need some shell scripting or some js or something because I'm like over 9000 times faster at anything like that  
17:09 <mflorea> cjd: sure, np ;)  
17:20 <sburjan> has quit  
17:22 <KermitTheFragger> has quit  
18:02 <tmortagne> mflorea: I updated the URL on l10n wiki  
18:03 <mflorea> tmortagne: wdym?  
18:03 <tmortagne> http://l10n.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XE/WebHome  
18:03 <mflorea> ah, right  
18:03 <tmortagne> moving XEM to deprecated  
18:03 <mflorea> thanks  
18:04 <tmortagne> mflorea: was not your job, should have been done by the one who changed all that ;)  
18:04 <mflorea> yep :)  
18:05 <tmortagne> I can't seems to be able to access http://l10n.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/edit/XEM/WebHome?editor=object  
18:05 <tmortagne> view works well  
18:05 <tmortagne> I don't understand  
18:05 <tmortagne> I did not had any issue for XE  
18:08 <tmortagne> done  
18:09 <mflorea> I have to go. I'll start the release from home. Have a nice evening and a great weekend!  
18:10 <mflorea> has quit  
18:13 <tmortagne> has quit
